full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SMAN BLA'I MDO CHOG DANG 'BREL BAR GSHIN PO'I SBYANG CHOG BYA TSUL GYI NGAG 'DON 'KHRIGS CHAGS SU BKOD PA NYAM THAG GDUNG SEL BDUD RTZI'I CHAR RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES SMAN BLA'I MDO CHOG DANG 'BREL BAR GSHIN PO'I SBYANG CHOG BYA TSUL GYI NGAG 'DON 'KHRIGS CHAGS SU BKOD PA NYAM THAG GDUNG SEL BDUD RTZI'I CHAR RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN DAR RGYAS GLING GI GVA RIGS DPYOD LDAN DKA' BCU PHYAG DOR SKYABS KYIS DGA' DON ZUR BKOD RE CIS KYANG ZHES RAB DKAR MHARDZAS DANG BCAS TE YANG YANG BSKUL ZHING, RANG GZHAN MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR BSAM STE, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN GZUGS MKHAN MING BLO BZANG RTA DBYANGS KYIS KLUNG CHEN THO'U LA'I BYANG 'GRAM DU BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS MTHUN SLOB DU DKA' BCU BLO BZANG SHES RAB KYIS BGYIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG NYAM THAG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA YUN DU PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
